title: Build Codetykoons business website with multi-page layout and contact form

requirements.summary: Create Home page with hero section containing headline, subheading, and CTA button
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays headline 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions'
Subheading explains Codetykoons' value proposition for business growth
CTA button labeled 'Get a Free Consultation' is prominently displayed

file_operations.description: Create Home page component with hero section containing headline 'We Build Powerful Digital Solutions', subheading explaining value proposition, and CTA button labeled 'Get a Free Consultation'. Integrate generated hero background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as background.

requirements.summary: Add Services overview section to Home page listing six core services
acceptanceCriteria: Services section displays all six services clearly

file_operations.description: Add Services overview section to Home page listing Custom Website Development, E-commerce Website Development, Web Applications, SEO Optimization, Website Maintenance & Support, and API Integration. Use generated service icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/service-web-dev.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-ecommerce.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-web-apps.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-seo.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-maintenance.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-api.dim_400x300.png.

acceptanceCriteria: Why Choose Us section is present on Home page

file_operations.description: Add Why Choose Us section highlighting Codetykoons' competitive advantages and value propositions with content focused on trust, quality, and expertise.

requirements.summary: Add Portfolio preview section to Home page showcasing selected projects
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio preview section displays project samples
Projects are visually appealing and representative of company work

file_operations.description: Add Portfolio preview section showcasing selected completed projects. Display generated project mockups: frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-1.dim_600x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-2.dim_600x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-3.dim_600x400.png with project descriptions.

requirements.summary: Add Testimonials section to Home page with client feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials section displays client reviews

file_operations.description: Add Testimonials section with client feedback and reviews that build credibility and trust.

requirements.summary: Add Contact call-to-action section to Home page
acceptanceCriteria: Contact CTA section is present with clear messaging
CTA drives users toward contact action

file_operations.description: Add Contact call-to-action section encouraging visitors to reach out with clear messaging driving users toward contact action.

requirements.summary: Add Footer with social media links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays social media links
Footer is consistent across all pages

file_operations.description: Create Footer component with social media links that will be used consistently across all pages.

requirements.summary: Create About Us page explaining Codetykoons mission and values
acceptanceCriteria: About Us page communicates company mission and values
Content emphasizes scalability, security, and performance

file_operations.description: Create About Us page explaining that Codetykoons is dedicated to building scalable, secure, and high-performance web solutions with content emphasizing these three pillars.

requirements.summary: Create Services page showcasing all six services with detailed descriptions
acceptanceCriteria: Services page lists all six services
Each service has a detailed description
Layout is clean and easy to navigate

Use generated service icons: frontend/public/assets/generated/service-web-dev.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-ecommerce.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-web-apps.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-seo.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-maintenance.dim_400x300.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-api.dim_400x300.png.

requirements.summary: Create Portfolio page to display completed projects and case studies
acceptanceCriteria: Portfolio page showcases completed projects
Projects are presented with images and descriptions

file_operations.description: Create Portfolio page displaying completed projects and case studies. Use generated project mockups: frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-1.dim_600x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-2.dim_600x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/portfolio-3.dim_600x400.png with project descriptions and case study details.

requirements.summary: Create optional Pricing page to display service pricing tiers
acceptanceCriteria: Pricing page displays service tiers clearly
Pricing information is easy to understand

file_operations.description: Create Pricing page displaying service pricing tiers and packages with clear, easy-to-understand pricing information.

requirements.summary: Create Contact Us page with form and contact options
acceptanceCriteria: Contact form includes Name, Email, Phone, and Project Details fields
Form submits data to backend for processing
Email and WhatsApp contact options are displayed
Form validation prevents invalid submissions

file_operations.description: Create Contact Us page with form fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Project Details. Implement form validation and submission to backend using the submitContactForm method from backend interface. Include email and WhatsApp contact options displayed prominently.

Create ContactForm component with validated input fields (Name, Email, Phone, Project Details) and submit handler that calls backend submitContactForm method. Handle success and error states appropriately.

requirements.summary: Implement clean, modern, tech-focused design with blue and white color palette
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses blue and white as primary colors
Visual style is clean, modern, and professional
Design builds trust and credibility

file_operations.description: Update global styles to implement blue and white color palette with CSS custom properties. Define primary, secondary, and accent colors using blue shades and white, ensuring clean, modern, tech-focused aesthetic throughout.

Configure Tailwind theme with blue and white color palette. Define custom colors for primary (blue variations), secondary, and background colors aligned with professional tech-focused design requirements.

requirements.summary: Implement minimal but bold sections with smooth scroll and modern animations
acceptanceCriteria: Sections are minimalist yet visually impactful
Smooth scroll behavior is implemented
Modern animations enhance user experience without being distracting

file_operations.description: Add smooth scroll behavior globally and define base animation utilities for fade-in, slide-in, and other modern transitions that will be used across sections.
Create custom hook for scroll-triggered animations that applies modern animation effects to sections as they enter viewport, ensuring smooth and subtle transitions.

requirements.summary: Ensure all pages are mobile responsive with fast loading and modern UI
acceptanceCriteria: All pages display correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Page load times are optimized
UI elements scale and adapt to different screen sizes

file_operations.description: Create responsive Layout component wrapping all pages with mobile-first design approach. Implement responsive navigation, mobile menu, and ensure consistent layout behavior across mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints. Include generated logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_200x60.png in header.
Configure responsive breakpoints and utilities for mobile, tablet, and desktop layouts ensuring optimal display across all device sizes.

requirements.summary: Implement SEO optimization with professional business tone
acceptanceCriteria: Content uses professional, business-appropriate language
Meta tags, headings, and alt text support SEO
Content targets startup, small business, and entrepreneur audiences

file_operations.description: Create SEOHead component for managing page-level meta tags, titles, descriptions, and Open Graph tags with professional business tone targeting startups, small businesses, and entrepreneurs.
Update base HTML with global SEO meta tags, proper document structure, and default meta descriptions with professional business tone.

requirements.summary: Implement navigation structure for all six pages
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation menu is present on all pages
All six pages are accessible from navigation
Navigation is intuitive and user-friendly

file_operations.description: Create Navigation component with links to Home, About Us, Services, Portfolio, Pricing, and Contact Us pages. Include responsive mobile menu and highlight active page. Use generated logo from frontend/public/assets/generated/logo.dim_200x60.png.

Configure React Router with routes for Home (/), About Us (/about), Services (/services), Portfolio (/portfolio), Pricing (/pricing), and Contact Us (/contact) pages. Wrap all routes with Layout component containing Navigation and Footer.
